examples: We sailed on a boat along the river.
He rowed the boat across the lake.

suggested: Boating is the perfect adventure for those who love the water.
A boat is a passport to adventure on the open sea.
Boating is a great way to relax and unwind.
There's nothing more relaxing than spending a day on a boat.
Owning a boat is the ultimate luxury for those who love the water.
Boats are a symbol of luxury and status.
Boating gives you the freedom to explore the water on your own terms.
The feeling of freedom you get on a boat is unbeatable.
Being the captain of your own boat makes you feel like an admiral.
Every boat owner is the admiral of their own fleet.
Boating is the perfect way to get out on the water and do some fishing.
Fishing from a boat is a whole different experience than fishing from shore.
